mapper.update: update musers set card_id = #{cardId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, creat_at = #{creatAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, last_update = #{lastUpdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, card_id, creat_at, last_update, name, phone from musers
